The Grafana Cloud Linux server integration comes with a number of pre-built dashboards and alerts that you can use immediately. In this step of the journey, you install those dashboards and alerts.

**Did you know?** You aren't limited to using the pre-built dashboards and alerts. You can create your own dashboards and alerts.

To install and view Linux server dashboards and alerts:
In the **Install dashboards and alerts** section, click **Install**.
You should see the following message: `Dashboards and alerts have been installed.`

To view dashboards, click **View Dashboards**.

A folder containing the integration dashboards appears.
To see the installed alerts, navigate to **Alerts & IRM > Alerting > Alert rules**.
The Alert rules page shows all active alerts. Linux integration alerts begin with `integrations-linux-node`.
